definitions.definition: An assembly including one or more judges to conduct judicial business; a court of law .
A kind of village hall used to transact business , to quarter troops and travellers, and to confine prisoners .

main_definition: ( law ) An assembly including one or more judges to conduct judicial business; a court of law .
secondary_definitions: ( Philippines , historical ) A kind of village hall used to transact business , to quarter troops and travellers, and to confine prisoners .
